data.title: Great way to experience the Gainesville food scene!
data.text: I have lived in Gainesville for awhile and always go to the same restaurants. Gainesville Food tour was a great way for a local to experience new places and find some new favorites in town!

data.title: Food Adventure
data.text: Went on this tour with some friends and a couple elderly ladies.  Ryan and Caroline were great host and guides answering all our questions and showing us several excellent local eateries.  Our favorites were Emiliano's (Latin cuisine) and The Hyppo Gourmet Ice Pops (dozens of flavors you wouldn't think would go together and work).  The other stops on the tour were also excellent, but the uniqueness of the first two made them stand out in my mind.  If you have the time and are in the Gainesville area this is a definite must do.

owner_response.author: Gainesville F, Owner at Gainesville Food Tour, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We had a great time with you all and appreciate your driving from the Villages to adventure with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Go Gainesville Food Tour
data.text:
The food at Emiliano's Cafe was my favorite because the pairings of the different foods was so amazing.  Ryan and Caroline's passion for food and the history of Gainesville
made the hours we spent really, really enjoyable.  I enjoyed the last meal at home, as we were just to full to eat it.  I highly recommend the tour.  They are a fun couple to spend time with.
Eileen and Larry

owner_response.author: Gainesville F, Owner at Gainesville Food Tour, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Eileen and Larry! It was so nice to spend the day with you all and appreciate you coming all the way from the Villages! We look forward to taking you up on some of your recommendations for Alaska, and hope to see you all again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fabulous Time!
data.text: As a newbie to Gainesville, I always struggled with where to go for date night or to bring friends and family visiting. This food tour did more than just show me some great local grub, but also made me appreciate Gainesville and what it has to offer in food and entertainment. Did this food tour make me love Gainesville? Why, yes it did. A truly great way to explore Gainesville!

data.title: Discover Gainesville in a foodie way
data.text: It was a great tour and I got so full after only two stops! Learnt many interesting facts about Gville and they are super friendly! A day well spent :-)

data.title: A great way to fall more deeply in love with Gainesville
data.text: Caroline and Ryan's love for all things Gainesville--history, local business, but especially people,shines brightly in this meticulously crafted, absolutely delicious Food Tour.  We loved the special holiday evening tour and can't wait to see what this couple cooks up for their next special event.  We were so impressed that we gifted another couple with a Food Tour of their own, knowing that GFT could provide an incredible experience within the boundaries of some dietary restrictions.  We will be doing this again!

data.title: Sunday Funday Food Tour
data.text: What a great way to explore downtown Gainesville, learn about the local area, eat delicious food and meet wonderful people. Caroline and Ryan were excellent tour guides and organized an amazing tour. We sampled delicious foods at every stop and ended our tour very well fed!

data.title: Fabulous Gainesville Activity
data.text: We loved the tour.  Everything from the food to the history was amazing.  Caroline and Ryan did a wonderful job!

data.title: This is a must do if you are visiting or live in Gainesville!
data.text: Really delicious food and very generous servings at each restaurant!  The coolest thing about the tour is that you get to eat at 6 different restaurants and learn about the food and restaurants you're dining at. We got a private tour of the smoker at Mojo grill and the grill master showed us first hand how they smoke their meats and a lesson on brisket. Ryan and Caroline did a great job leading the tour and enlightened us on some interesting facts about Gainesville's history. This was a really fun way to spend my Sunday evening and I can't recommend it highly enough!

data.title: Great food and Great info about Gainesville
data.text: A great way to learn about Gainesville and to try foods from restaurants that you haven't been to before.  After the tour, there are a number or restaurants that I would like to try for a regular lunch or dinner.

data.title: I loved it!  Great food, lots of fun, friendly and knowledgable tour guides
data.text: This tour was so much fun! I've been on 2 food tours in NYC and 2 in San Francisco and this was the best one, by far. Caroline and Ryan did a fantastic job leading us on an amazing tour through many of the best restaurants in downtown Gainesville. I've lived in Gainesville for 35 years and hadn't been to at least half the restaurants on the list. I enjoyed the focus on local restaurants, too, as I get tired of the chains and Archer Road. I also learned a lot about Gainesville, a town I loved so much as a student that I chose to raise my family here. Thanks for bringing this exciting new adventure to our town. If you're visiting, new to Gainesville or a longtime resident, you'll find this a delightful experience.

data.title: Unique experience for locals and visitors!
data.text: This was a super fun experience for our whole family. We are residents of Gainesville and were able to spend time with each other in a new, fun way. I would also recommend this to those visiting Gainesville as it is a good way to get to know Gainesville and be familiar with restaurants to re-visit the next time you stay! Tons of food, lots of laughs, and good history information!

data.title: A new must-do activity in Gainesville!!
data.text: Gainesville Food Tour was fantastic!  Not only did I learn a great deal about Gainesville that I didn't know beofre, I was able to taste the delicious food from new and local favorite restaurants.  I have done food tours in other cities and this by far ranks as one of the top food tours!  Diverse food and drink options which was a great opportunity to try new things!  Caroline and Ryan did a wonderful job and I can't wait to do it again when family and friends visit Gainesville!

data.title: Great for both locals and travelers!
data.text: I have lived in Gainesville for over 10 years now and learned so much and got to explore areas of Gainesville I have never been to! The choice of restaurants was spot on...everything was delicious! I definitely suggest skipping breakfast prior to attending though, the portions are on the larger side. The restaurants do provide take home boxes if needed. The owners, Ryan and Caroline, are energetic, knowledgeable, and extremely personable. I definitely recommend this food tour for any Gainesville local that loves food and wants to try something new. It would also be perfect for any traveler passing through the area that just can't decide on one restaurant to eat at. You will leave with some Gainesville history and a full belly :)

data.title: Loved Gainesville Food Tour!
data.text:
My husband and I went on this food tour, and got to try some amazing restaurants in Gainesville that we had never really considered trying. The tour takes you to some pretty unique spots, and let me say, the food at every single stop was AWESOME! We were very pleased with the quantity of food, it was definitely more than we expected. 
The tour guides were great! They take you around downtown Gainesville, give you lots of interesting facts about the town and it's history. 
If you are looking for something different and fun to do on a Sunday afternoon, this is the perfect plan!
